about_the_game:
Global Maps, Immersive Experience


From New York streets to Middle Eastern deserts, European towns to Brazilian jungles, Hong Kong ports to Japanese cities, Real Shoot meticulously crafts 28 unique maps. Each brimming with regional characteristics and intricate details, making you feel as if you're on real battlegrounds around the world.

Vast Arsenal, Customize Your Style


Choose from over 50 high-quality weapons, including powerful submachine guns, versatile pistols, and devastating shotguns. Each weapon features advanced materials, including silver and gold finishes, ensuring both top performance and a distinctive look. Whether you prefer close-quarters combat or long-range engagements, there's a weapon to match your playstyle.

Flexible Character Movements, Smooth Gameplay


Operatives in Real Shoot exhibit highly flexible movements and actions, including rolling, climbing, and sliding. These agile maneuvers allow you to navigate the battlefield with ease, executing precise attacks and strategic evasions seamlessly.

Dynamic Weather System, Authentic Combat Experience


Experience a realistic weather system adding complexity to your missions. Whether battling through sudden downpours or scorching desert heat, weather changes impact your strategy and actions. Lifelike rain interactions immerse you in every environment, enhancing the overall experience.

Intelligent and Diverse Enemy AI, Ultimate Challenge


Confront highly trained, tactically diverse enemies who adapt to your actions in real time. The intelligent AI provides a formidable challenge, requiring you to use both your combat skills and strategic thinking to outmaneuver them. Each encounter tests your abilities to their limits.

Varied Game Modes, Endless Fun


Real Shoot offers multiple exciting game modes, including Assassination, Battle Royale, Assault, Demolition, and Elimination. Each mode is uniquely designed to provide thrilling and challenging gameplay, keeping you engaged and entertained.

Advanced Tech Gadgets, Tactical Advantage


In addition to weapons, Real Shoot equips you with advanced technological gadgets. The smartwatch comes with night vision capabilities, allowing you to see clearly in the dark. Additionally, the aim assist feature helps improve shooting accuracy, giving you an edge in combat.

Comfortable Experience, Thoughtful Settings


Understanding that some players might experience motion sickness with the bodycam perspective, Real Shoot includes an option to disable the bodycam UI, ensuring a more comfortable gaming experience tailored to your preferences.

Global Language Support, Connect with Players Worldwide


The game supports nearly 20 languages, making it accessible to players from around the globe. Engage with a worldwide community of gamers, sharing the thrill of combat and the joy of becoming a top-tier operative.

Cutting-Edge Graphics Technology, Stunning Visuals


Real Shoot employs the latest DLSS and FSR technologies to deliver exceptional visual quality and smooth gameplay. Every frame is meticulously rendered, and every detail comes to life, offering a truly breathtaking visual experience.

Join Real Shoot now, become the best operative in the Shadow Ops unit, embark on a global adventure, eliminate all threats, and rise to the ranks of the world's top agents!

name: Real Shoot（BODYCAM）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10，11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600, Core i5 6600K
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX580,Nvidia GeForce GT750 Ti (1080p low 60fps)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10，11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X, Intel Core i7 4790
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT, Nvidia GeForce RTX2060（1080p high 100fps)

short_description: Welcome to Real Shoot, an ultra-realistic single-player first-person shooter with a bodycam perspective. As an elite operative in the Shadow Hunt unit, you'll complete various combat objectives and eliminate international crime syndicates.The game is coming soon!Add it to your wishlist now!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian, Turkish, Greek, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Arabic, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support
